original_text: Not that I am speaking of being in need, for I have learned in whatever situation I am to be content.
korean_text: 내가 궁핍하므로 말하는 것이 아니니라 어떠한 형편에든지 나는 자족하기를 배웠노니

sentences.original_text: Not that I am speaking of being in need
for I have learned in whatever situation I am
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 내가 어떠한 형편에 있든지 배웠으니
